items.sentence: Tom always orders the cheapest item on the menu.
I want to be just like my father when I grow up.
Tom had to wait a long time in the waiting room.
It was a lot tougher than I thought it would be.
It was easy for Tom to convince Mary to do that.
You haven\'t told us why Tom doesn\'t like Mary.
You know Tom is a friend of Mary\'s, don\'t you?
Three customers came in just as we were closing.
Tom asked Mary to teach him how to do the waltz.
Tom asked me if I would help him move his piano.
Both Tom and Mary plan to study music in Boston.
I learned how to write my name when I was three.
Tom didn\'t seem to be aware that Mary did that.
Tom didn\'t seem to understand your explanation.
Tom didn\'t stop smoking, so Mary left the room.
I asked Tom to wait for me at the train station.
I asked him not to play the piano late at night.
I can be here for a while longer if you need me.
I can do that with one hand tied behind my back.
Tom said he didn\'t want to go drinking with us.
Tom said that he didn\'t really plan to do that.
Give me another couple of days to think it over.
I told Tom that I never wanted to see him again.
I wish I could get Tom to show me how to juggle.
I wonder whether Tom did that last night or not.
I want you to stay in Boston until October 20th.
I was about to leave, but Tom came, so I stayed.
You\'ve already decided not to go, haven\'t you?
I suspect that Tom and Mary aren\'t very hungry.
I think I shouldn\'t have told Tom where I live.
I don\'t think that Tom ought to do that inside.
I had no idea that Tom wasn\'t going to be here.
My parents hardly ever punished me for anything.
We can\'t leave Boston until we finish this job.
I\'ll see if I can find out why Tom isn\'t here.
You\'re really not much fun at parties, are you?
Tom doesn\'t get along with anyone in his class.
I don\'t like this room. May I have another one?
At first, I didn\'t know that my leg was broken.
It makes me smile every time I see this picture.
Tom said he didn\'t have anything to write with.
Tom said that he couldn\'t understand my French.
Tom says he doesn\'t want to do that by himself.
Tom says he isn\'t in the mood to do that today.
Why haven\'t you been showing up to work lately?
A man with a full belly thinks no one is hungry.
Couldn\'t you have told me about that yesterday?
Tom is just one of the kids in our neighborhood.
My father says he\'s planning to buy me a horse.
My first French teacher\'s name was Tom Jackson.
